title: Where can I find single page notes (short, concise and to the point) for organic chemistry class 12? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not only Organic Chemistry, but all PCM Notes.  Preparation for JEE Main is actually The Utilization of your Limited Time to Produce Maximum Output. When I was appearing for JEE Mains, for the first time. I had the same questions with me. We never get serious about JEE Mains till we give our Boards. At this stage, we have three kind of students: All Prepared, these people have already utilized their available time till now and have studied everything and have a really good practice from Previous year Questions.Studied but forgotten, Most of you would find yourself getting fit in this category. You have studied the chapters when they were being done in your school or coaching classes. But the issue you guys are facing now is the need for short Notes for Quick Revision.Have not studied anything properly, still wants to score good Marks. We have a lot of other work to do and we tend to ignore and postpone our studies for some work or another. Till now, there was no Help for You Guys. But FORTUNATELY We have a solution now, Look at these notes, you You can study them Right From Scratch.And the Traditional teaching methods are no more interesting or maybe they never were. At this stage of life when we have no idea about class 11 syllabus and half about class 12 syllabus, all we need is A Good Quality Notes, which can let us study any chapter from scratch in such a short time with clarity about the chapter. Like these, Classification of Elements and Periodicity in Properties -  Current Electricity -  Organic Chemistry Mind Map -  Capacitor -  You just have to Select the Chapter.Go through the One Page Short Notes several times till you understand it.Memorize it. The formulas, the definitions, the processess.And then Attempting the Solved previous Year Questions for understanding the procedure to solve different kind of Questions.Again going through the Notes for Brush Up.And Finally Practicing the Unsolved Previous Year Questions.Till last year, there was no such content available on the internet. At heart, every student want such notes, but land up paying at coaching institutes to grow their business. Have a visit at moon8jeemainsnotes. com or Whatsapp at 9013291622.
